-Arepa pabellón. -Arepa parió.

-[kids] Four, three, two, one. -[Allison] No, no, no, no. No, no, no, no.

-No is the answer. -Hey! No! No, no, no!

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. Ah-ah-ah. No.
Okay, guys, screen time's over.
-Wait, no, no. Wait. Five more minutes. -Nope.
Hey! Mom! Mom, Mom. Mom, Mom!
[Allison] Saying no 50 times an hour?
No! Absolutely not! Nope on a rope!

translation.en: No way, no how, not by a long shot,

translation.en: [Allison] It's called parenting.
Hey, Cheryl, how's it going? Good morning.
Hey, listen, I have a quick question.
Um, I have a job interview this afternoon.
I was wondering if you could take Ellie for a couple of hours after school?

Okay, put us down for three boxes of Samoas.

translation.en: Okay, put me down. Ten boxes.

translation.en: Cheryl Nelson is shaking me down.
Yep, I'll… I'll wait.
Mom? Fleekfest? Dad said he's okay with me going if you are.
translation.it: Posso andare al Fleek Fest? Papà dice di sì, se sei d'accordo.

translation.en: Oh, he did?
Wait, you're going to a freak fest?
translation.it: Freak Fest? Un festival di stramboidi?

translation.en: Awesome. You can finally be with your people.
It's called Fleekfest. It's a music festival. It's cool.
translation.it: "Fleekfest". È un festival musicale. È fico.

translation.en: I guess if you think it's cool, I'm sure it's super cool.
translation.it: Beh, se tu credi che sia fico, allora sarà super fico.

translation.en: -Did you hear what I asked? -Yeah, you're 14. You can't go without a parent.
translation.it: - Mi hai sentita? - Hai 14 anni, ti serve un accompagnatore.

translation.en: Hi. You can? I'll put a blue note and the check in her backpack. Thank you.
translation.it: Ehi. Puoi? Le metto un biglietto blu coi soldi nello zaino. Grazie.

translation.en: Nobody wants to go to a music festival with their parent.
translation.it: Nessuno va a un festival coi genitori.

translation.en: Dad, please help! Mom. What… What? She said no?
translation.it: - Papà, aiutami con la mamma. - Ha detto di no?

translation.en: If your mother says no, it's no, sweetie. Really? Don't you mean if we say no?
translation.it: - Se la mamma dice di no, è no, tesoro. - "Se noi diciamo di no", vorrai dire.

translation.en: Guys? Watch this. I think I put the right amount of baking soda in this time.
translation.it: Ehi, guardate. Credo di aver azzeccato la quantità di bicarbonato.

translation.en: Get ready for a waffle volcano in three, two…
translation.it: Preparatevi per un waffle vulcano tra tre, due…

translation.en: Must've mixed the catalyst wrong. You'll get it next time.
translation.it: - Avrò sbagliato col catalizzatore. - Ci riuscirai.

translation.en: Can I sign your math homework? Duh. Yeah, you can sign all my homework, except for math. Whoops.
translation.it: - Posso firmare i compiti di matematica? - Puoi firmarli tutti. Tranne quelli. Ops.

translation.en: -You told me you finished everything. -Hey, don't worry.
translation.it: Dicevi di averli fatti tutti. Tranquilla, me la caverò col mio fascino.

translation.en: I get by on my charm.
translation.it: Tranquilla, me la caverò col mio fascino.

translation.en: Honey, I'm gonna stop by the gym after work, okay? I need to keep sculpting the Carlos.
translation.it: Tesoro, dopo il lavoro vado in palestra. Devo continuare a scolpire il Carlos.

translation.en: -Tonight? You're stopping by the gym? -Yeah. Tonight.
-Really? Tonight? -[Carlos] Tonight.
Oh. Tonight? No, no, not tonight. No, tonight is, um, is our…
translation.it: Stasera? No, non stasera, perché stasera è il nostro…

translation.en: -Your… The kids'… Uh… -Come on.
-Anniver… Birthday? Soccer? -Really? Come on. You can do it.
translation.it: - Anniv… Compleanno? Calcio? - Davvero? Puoi farcela.

translation.en: -Parent-teacher night, Daddy. -Ah. That one. Yeah.
I don't understand how you can open this refrigerator ten times a day
translation.it: Non capisco come si possa aprire il frigo 10 volte al giorno

translation.en: and not see this beautiful calendar.
Eh, because it's gotten a little over-complicated.
translation.it: Perché è diventato un po' troppo complicato.

translation.en: -It hurts my eyes. -[Carlos] Growing up, things were simple.
translation.it: Mi fa male agli occhi. Un tempo, le cose erano semplici. Sveglia, lavoro o scuola, e poi…

translation.en: You wake up, go to school or work, and then you have to--
translation.it: Un tempo, le cose erano semplici. Sveglia, lavoro o scuola, e poi…

translation.en: I know how to twerk.
-Does she mean twerk twerk? -"To work," not "twerk." Is she twerking?
translation.it: - Fa sul serio? - "Scuola", non "sculetta". Ma sculetta?

translation.en: [Katie] She totally is.
-[Allison] No! -Not side to side, Ellie. Up and down.
translation.it: Non laterale. Fai su e giù.

translation.en: -Let me show you. -Katie. No.
-[Carlos] Do you want me to… -No!
Really loosen your hips.
Nobody's loosening their hips. Child!
translation.it: Non se ne parla, è una bambina!

translation.en: Really pop it, Ellie.
[Allison] Carlos, help me out!
Yo. You gotta shake your body.
Come on. Pop it, Ellie!
Nobody's popping it! We are late!
Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Yes!
The catalyst!
I mean, I'm so sorry.
You can put on your music if you want, Daddy. I don't mind.
translation.it: Puoi mettere la tua musica, papà. Non mi dispiace.

translation.en: -Really, honey? -Yup.
Okay. Thank you.
♪ Oh, I'm a gummy bear Yes, I'm a gummy bear ♪
translation.it: Sono un orsetto gommoso Sì, sono un orsetto gommoso

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I'm a yummy, tummy, funny Lucky gummy bear ♪
translation.it: Oh, sì, sono un orsetto gommoso Goloso, pacioccoso, coccoloso

translation.en: ♪ Oh yeah, gummy, gummy Gummy, gummy, gummy bear ♪
translation.it: Oh, sì, un orsetto davvero super gommoso

translation.en: ♪ Gummy, gummy, gummy, gummy, gummy bear ♪
[girl] So, what'd she say?
Bad news, Lay. Mom gave a thumbs-down to Fleekfest.
translation.it: - Allora, cos'ha detto? - Brutte notizie. Mamma non mi manda al Fleek Fest.

translation.en: [Layla] What?
But your mom's so smart and cool and gorgeous.
translation.it: Ma tua madre è così intelligente, forte e bellissima.

translation.en: I know.
Sometimes I'm like, "Is she my mom, or is she a runway model?"
translation.it: A volte mi chiedo se sia mia madre o una super modella.

translation.en: If I'm so great, you won't mind me coming with you, then you can go.
translation.it: Se sono così forte, allora ti accompagno, così puoi andarci.

translation.en: Yeah, no, thanks.
Never mind.
I don't get it. I took you two to Taylor Swift a couple of years ago. We had a blast.
translation.it: Non capisco. Quando vi ho portate a vedere Taylor Swift è stato fico.

translation.en: -I was 12 then. I was a little tween. -[laughs]
translation.it: Avevo 12 anni, ero ancora una bambina.

translation.en: Dad said I could go. He believes in me. He knows I can handle myself.
translation.it: Papà ha acconsentito. Lui crede in me, sa che so badare a me stessa.

translation.en: Your dad just wants to be the good guy because he knows that I will say no.
translation.it: Tuo padre vuole fare il buono perché tanto sa che dirò io di no.

translation.en: And I do believe in you.
It's just that concerts like Fleekfest bring out
translation.it: È solo che ai concerti come il Fleek Fest

translation.en: a whole world of people you have not been exposed to yet.
translation.it: trovi gente a cui non sei ancora stata esposta,

translation.en: And it's not gonna happen without a parent.
translation.it: e non può succedere senza un genitore.

translation.en: Well, when will I be able to go to concerts alone?
translation.it: E quando potrò andare ai concerti da sola?

translation.en: Never. You will always have to go to concerts with me your whole life.
translation.it: Mai. Dovrai andarci con me per tutta la tua vita.

translation.en: -Even when I'm your age? -Especially when you're my age.
translation.it: - Anche alla tua età? - Soprattutto allora.

translation.en: You will love it because you love me.
translation.it: E lo adorerai perché adori me.

translation.en: Four more years. Four more years. Four more years. ♪ Baby I need your loving ♪
Mom, no.
-My ears are bleeding. -Mom!
What is it with you and this song? Because you love this song.
translation.it: - Perché sei fissata con questa canzone? - Perché ti piace.

translation.en: -I sang it when you were a baby. -[Katie] I'm not a baby.
translation.it: - Te la cantavo da piccola. - Sono grande.

translation.en: Okay, I better… I better turn it down for the school drop-off.
translation.it: Ok, è meglio che abbassi il volume ora che arriviamo a scuola.

translation.it: - Non voglio andare a scuola. - Non vorrei portartici, ma devo.

translation.en: -No. -Yes. -No. -Yes. -No. -Yes. -No. -Yes. -No. -Yes.
[Carlos] No drones inside, for the 50th time! [man] Sorry, Mom.

translation.en: Hey, Mr. Torres. I… I promise this never happens.
translation.it: Salve, sig. Torres. Le assicuro che non capita mai.

translation.it: Guardi, l'ho aggiustato. Funziona. Ehi, l'ho sist…

translation.en: Guys! Joan?
Guys! Guys!
[panting] It's still way too loud.
But the ads are going to say these speakers will melt your brains.

translation.en: -That wouldn't hold up with a waiver. -Fine.
translation.it: - Non va bene per il diritto di recesso. - Ok.

translation.en: [groans] Boo.
My job is to keep us from getting sued. Bring the decibel level down.

translation.en: Also, you're not supposed to bring food in a testing area.

translation.en: I have to ask you to throw the McGriddle away.
[Carlos] Joan? Both of you.
[sighs] Mine's finished.
Look, I hate saying no, but it's my job. Okay?

translation.en: -[man] Mrs. Torres? Hi. -Hi.
[interviewer] You were VP of marketing at Kulger Food? For a long time. I loved that job,
translation.it: - "Vicepresidente marketing alla Kulger"? - Sì, lo sono stata a lungo e l'amavo.

translation.en: but then I had kids, and for a while, it was just too much.
translation.it: Ma poi ho avuto dei figli e per un po' è stato troppo.

translation.en: I bet you're better at multitasking.
I never stopped working. I just stopped getting paid for it.
translation.it: Non ho smesso di lavorare, ma di farmi pagare.

translation.en: I get it. I mean, I'm a mom too. [laughs] Yeah. Of course you are.
translation.it: - Lo capisco, sono mamma anch'io. - Ma certo, lo sapevo.

translation.en: I mean, call me crazy, but this feels so nice.
translation.it: Insomma, ti sembrerò pazza, ma ho una bella sensazione al riguardo.

translation.en: What do you think?
Listen, I would love to hire you for something. I would, but--
-Oh, I'm so glad. -Allison, this is an entry-level position.
translation.it: Ne sono felice. Ma questo è un posto da stagista.

translation.en: I mean, I'm looking for some entitled millennial who I'd keep here until 10:00 every night.
translation.it: Sto cercando una ventenne che se la crede da tenere qui ogni sera fino a tardi.

translation.en: Every night.
[interviewer] Who I could watch cry while eating a gluten-free burrito
translation.it: Da vedere piangere mentre mangia un burrito senza glutine

translation.en: and hashtags, "Hurt feelings. This job is so unfair."
I wouldn't want to do that to you. I like you too much.
translation.it: E non vorrei mai fare questo a te. Mi piaci troppo.

translation.en: I like you too.
-[Carlos] I'm sorry about the job, honey. -[Allison] Oh, it's fine.
translation.it: - Mi dispiace per il lavoro, tesoro. - Non fa niente.

translation.en: I don't know that I'm still passionate about marketing anyway.
translation.it: E poi non so se amo ancora il marketing.

translation.en: Not enough to cry into my gluten-free burrito.
translation.it: Non tanto da piangere nel mio burrito senza glutine.

translation.en: Hey. If I'm gonna go back to work,
translation.it: Ciao. Se voglio tornare a lavorare,

translation.en: I need to make sure our kids are okay without me first.
translation.it: devo assicurarmi che i ragazzi se la cavino senza di me.

translation.en: Hi, Mr. and Mrs. Torres.
-[man] Please, take a seat. -Thank you. We're getting two for one.
translation.it: Accomodatevi. Grazie. Due insegnanti al prezzo di uno?

translation.en: -I guess we'll be home early. -[chuckling]
Is this about Nando's grades? Because we are working on focus--
translation.it: È per i voti di Nando? Perché ci stiamo concentrando sul…

translation.en: Uh, it's not about Nando's grades, although, uh, they're not great.
translation.it: Non si tratta dei voti di Nando, anche se non sono un granché.

translation.en: Oh. Getting better.
We wanted to meet with you together
because, uh, we've noticed a common theme in Katie and Nando's schoolwork.
translation.it: perché abbiamo notato un tema comune nei lavori di Katie e Nando.

translation.en: What's the common theme?
Well, here's a haiku Katie wrote in my English class.
translation.it: Ho qui un haiku che Katie ha scritto per Letteratura.

translation.en: "A caged bird am I.
My mother, my sweet captor.
Mother, let me fly."
"Mother, my sweet captor.
-Mother, let me fly." -Five, seven, five. She nailed it. Haiku.
translation.it: - "Fammi volare." - Cinque, 7, 5. Sì, è un haiku.

translation.en: I didn't think much of it at first,
translation.it: All'inizio non ci ho dato peso,

translation.en: until Mr. Chan told me about a video that Nando made for his history class.
translation.it: ma poi il prof. Chan mi ha parlato del video di Nando per Storia.

translation.en: He made a video? That's pretty cool.
translation.it: Ha fatto un video? È fantastico.

translation.en: Let's just have a look at the video.
[Nando] The following program is intended for mature audiences only.
translation.it: Questo video è destinato a un pubblico adulto.

translation.en: It contains violence, adult language, and nudity.
Viewer discretion is advised.
Don't worry. There's no nudity.
-Oh, okay. -[scoffs]
[Nando] Stalin, Mussolini,
and Mom.
My mother might not have had anyone tortured or killed…
translation.it: Lei non ha ordinato torture o uccisioni…

translation.en: Not yet.
[Nando] …but in our house, she's no less of a dictator.
translation.it: …ma, a casa nostra, è una vera e propria dittatrice.

translation.en: So now I'm a dictator.
I'm not asking twice, Nando. You will do what I say, when I say it.
translation.it: Non te lo ripeterò. Farai ciò che ti dico quando lo dico io.

translation.en: I'm your mother. I don't need a reason.
translation.it: Sono tua madre. Non mi serve un motivo.

translation.en: I don't, so…
[Nando] Her goal, maximum oppression.
translation.it: Il suo obiettivo è l'oppressione suprema.

translation.en: You're not going till you finish your homework.
translation.it: Se non finisci i compiti, non esci.

translation.en: I mean, that's parenting.
Stop. It's like 1984 in this house. Big Mother is always watching.
translation.it: Basta! Sembra di stare in 1984. La Grande Madre ci guarda sempre.

translation.en: I like that nickname. It's tough. Why can't Miss Hoffling ever assign a happy book?
translation.it: Bel soprannome, è da tosta. La prof non può darvi un libro felice?

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay. They are depressing. Have you ever read Little Women?
translation.it: Beh, sono tutti deprimenti. Ha mai letto Piccole donne?

translation.en: She gets scarlet fever.
-The Little Prince? -[Hoffling] He has no family.
translation.it: - Il Piccolo Principe? - Non ha famiglia.

translation.en: Harry Potter's an orphan. There are no happy books.
translation.it: E Harry Potter è orfano. Non esistono libri felici.

translation.en: Don't walk away from me.
[roaring] Nando!
[Carlos] Where are you going?
Oh, come on, honey. You can make anyone look bad with editing.
translation.it: Dai, col montaggio si può mettere in cattiva luce chiunque.

translation.en: -You make me look bad. -Me? Why me?
translation.it: - Sei tu a mettermici. - Io? Perché?

translation.en: Because you get to be the fun dad everybody loves, and I am stuck being the bad cop.
translation.it: Perché fai il papà divertente mentre io sono il poliziotto cattivo.

translation.en: You didn't see the dad as the villain in that video, did you?
translation.it: In quel video, il cattivo non era il padre, no?

translation.en: It'll probably get uploaded to YouTube. Then I'll just be the viral psycho mom.
translation.it: Finirà su YouTube e diventerò virale come la mamma psicopatica.

translation.en: How'd you get to be the fun one? I was the fun one.
translation.it: Ero io quella divertente. Perché ora lo sei tu?

translation.en: Look, Ally, I am the bad guy all day at work.
translation.it: Faccio il cattivo tutto il giorno in ufficio.

translation.en: Every time I walk into that office, people stop laughing and leave the room,
translation.it: Quando entro io, la gente smette di ridere e se ne va.

translation.en: but when I come home, the kids, they actually smile when they see me.
translation.it: Quando torno a casa, invece, i bambini sorridono appena mi vedono.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, it's not fair.
I hear myself with the kids, and I think I wouldn't even hang out with me.
translation.it: Quando vedo come sono coi ragazzi, mi odio da sola.

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I have a suggestion.
Sorry, I didn't mean to frighten you. I was just eavesdropping or spying.
translation.it: Scusate, non volevo spaventarvi. Stavo solo origliando o spiando.

translation.en: There are so many parents out there, and I come in here to hide,
translation.it: Ci sono tanti genitori, così mi sono nascosto qui,

translation.en: and then I got really hungry, so I made a huge thing of tots.
translation.it: ma poi mi è venuta fame e ho cucinato parecchie crocchette.

translation.en: [chuckles] Would you guys care for a tot?
Do you want a tot? A hot tot?
Come here. Have a hot tot.
Have a tot. They're perfectly lukewarm.
Who are you?
It's Mr. Deacon. Katie and Nando's guidance counselor.
translation.it: È il sig. Deacon, il consulente scolastico.

translation.en: Yes, but thanks to budget cuts, I'm also the PE teacher/football coach.
translation.it: Sì, ma anche prof di ginnastica e allenatore di football, grazie ai tagli.

translation.en: Go, Cougars! Shoot the layup for the touchdown. [scoffs]
translation.it: Forza, Cougar! Fate canestro per il touchdown.

translation.en: I don't know anything about sports. No, I was a science major.
translation.it: Non so niente di sport. Sono laureato in Biologia.

translation.en: I specialized in the gastrointestinal behavior of field mice.
translation.it: Mi sono specializzato nell'attività gastrointestinale dei topi.

translation.en: But I do know a thing or two about parenting,
translation.it: Ma di certo so qualcosa sull'essere genitori,

translation.en: both professionally and personally.
translation.it: sia a livello professionale che personale.

translation.en: I have six beautiful kids at home.
translation.it: Ho sei bellissimi figli, a casa.

translation.en: Timmy, Tommy, Tonya, Tanya, Tyson, and Doug.
translation.it: Timmy, Tommy, Tonya, Tanya, Tyson e Doug.

translation.en: How come you look like you're just back from Tahiti?
translation.it: Ma sembra appena tornato da Tahiti!

translation.en: You want to know what my secret is?
I give my kids Yes Days.
translation.it: Concedo ai miei figli dei giorni dei sì.

translation.en: Yes Days? What's a Yes Day?
translation.it: E cosa sarebbe un giorno dei sì?

translation.en: You pick a day in the not-too-distant future,
translation.it: Scegliete un giorno in un futuro non troppo lontano

translation.en: and for 24 hours, you say yes to everything that your kids want.
translation.it: e, per 24 ore, dite di sì a tutto ciò che chiedono i vostri figli.

translation.en: -[Carlos] Really? -Yeah.
-Are you serious? -What, you say yes to everything?
translation.it: - Sul serio? - Dire di sì a tutto quanto?

translation.en: Well, you set some ground rules.
They can't ask for something in the future, and they can't kill anybody, obvi.
translation.it: non possono chiedere cose per il futuro né possono uccidere qualcuno.

translation.en: I know it sounds crazy, but it is a true game changer.
translation.it: So che sembra una follia, ma è una vera svolta.

translation.en: They liberate kids and give them a rare sense of autonomy,
translation.it: I figli si sentono liberi e acquisiscono un raro senso di autonomia,

translation.en: and it sets the parents free too.
translation.it: e si sentono liberi anche i genitori.

translation.en: Yeah, Mr. Coach Deacon,
I would love to just take a day off from being a mom and let my kids do whatever they want,
translation.it: vorrei tanto staccare e lasciare che i ragazzi facciano ciò che vogliono,

translation.en: but I'd also love to find a rainbow unicorn and fly it to the moon.
translation.it: ma vorrei anche trovare un unicorno arcobaleno e farlo volare.

translation.en: Then I think you'd want a pegasus.

Hold on. Change of strategy. Run for your life. Billy, get out of here!

-Who tied your shoes when you were babies? -Our moms!

Nice job, Commander Ellie.
Yay!
You're out!
Go!
Do you see them?
Destroy my beautiful children!
You are going down!
[Katie] Oh, this is bad.
You wanted to make me a warrior?
I'm a warrior!
Listen, I think we need to team up to take her out.
Deal.
Is that fair?
All's fair in love and Kablowey.

translation.en: Go for it.
That was perfect. It's messing her up.

Do you see which way she went?
[Nando] No, I didn't. Let's go.
Mom!
Yeah!
[coach] Oh wow! You got Kablowey-ed.
-Ah! -[coach] Ha-ha! You're done!

translation.en: I just gotta deal with a work thing.

Mom, come on. It's over. You don't even have any balloons left.

translation.en: Tú.
No. ¡Tú!
-¡Tú! -¡Tú!
-[screams] -Wait!
That's my mom! That's my mom!
Whoo! We did it!
[in Spanish] Blue forever!
[in English] Yeah!

translation.en: Tell Alan to issue a recall.
-[Ellie] Daddy? -Honey.
-Were you talking on a phone? -No. Phone? No, no.

translation.en: I was just out here looking at… Taking in the nature. I love nature.

translation.en: -Well, it looked like you were. -Nope, I wasn't.

translation.en: -No. -Daddy, do you hear that?
-What? -It must be coming from that bush.
Oh, she fell out of her nest.
Yeah.
We have to put her back.
-What? -I thought you loved nature.
Yeah, honey, but it's a very tall tree.

translation.en: Wait, wait. Ah. [grunts]
[Ellie] Come on, Daddy! Hurry up!
Oh, they're a family again, honey.

translation.en: Yay, Daddy!
It was actually a good idea, honey. Thank you.

Allison, baby!
-[Ellie] Come down, Daddy! -I'm coming down, honey!

translation.en: Ooh. You okay, Daddy?
Yeah, honey.
I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm okay.
I'm okay.
Oh my God! Stop!
Stop! Call your mom!
See? I'm not always a fun killer. Well, not today you aren't.

translation.en: -I'm still saying yes, aren't I? -[Carlos] Call 911!

translation.en: -Allison! -Is that Dad?
Yup, that's him.
Your brother's taking you to get dry ice, right?

translation.en: We're good. By the way, so many people are coming tonight.

translation.en: It's gonna be awesome.
[Nando] Fantastic.
Are you sure you need that much baking soda?
Yeah, it's a better catalyst.
Trust me. I'm an expert on catalysts now.

translation.en: -Allison! Call 911! -I'll have to call you right back.
translation.it: - Allison! Chiama il 911! - Ti richiamo tra poco.

translation.en: Call 911!
We need a doctor, stat! There's been a horrific bird attack.

translation.en: What? Do I have rabies?
No, this hospital sucks, so I exaggerated a little to goose 'em. No pun intended.

translation.en: -She's kidding. You're kidding, right? -Sure.
Here's a waiting room.
-Katie, you are in charge. -Okay.
Everybody stay with her, so I can find you later.

translation.en: -Hurry up! Hurry up! Hurry up! -Stay. It's okay.

translation.en: Oh good. So no concussion, no rabies, no bruises? He's good to go?

translation.en: He's in the clear. -I'll send in a nurse to discharge you. -Thank you.
translation.it: - Sì. Chiamo qualcuno per farla dimettere. - Grazie!

translation.en: -You're okay. That's great. -Yeah.
I will get the kids, and you take your time.

translation.en: Honey, I hate to be a party pooper, but my body's done.

translation.en: Can we finish this another day, please?
Really?
Yeah.
Yeah, I guess if you're not feeling well, of course we'll go home.

translation.en: -Thank you. -[Allison] Gosh.
Maybe I'll pop by the office, then go home and crash. -Sorry. What'd you say? -Hm?

So you don't feel well enough to finish this day for our family,

translation.en: but you do feel well enough to pop by the office.
translation.it: ma per passare in ufficio sì.

translation.en: It's a little crisis that happened this morning.

I told Karen I'd give her a Yes Day, and she doesn't even want it.

Think of the possibilities.
Grow up, Jean. Seriously.
How about you lighten up, Karen?
Take a chill pill.
Are you okay?
Yeah, I… I just got into a fight with my husband.

translation.en: Ah, and you want me to beat him up? No, nothing like that.

translation.en: [Jean] Give him a wedgie?
No, no. It's just that today was the first day in, like, a year
translation.it: - Gli faccio lo sparticulo? - No. È solo che oggi è stato il primo giorno dopo un anno

translation.en: where I felt like we were really in it together.

translation.en: -[Jean] Yeah. -And then he just had to go and be a wuss.
translation.it: - Già. - Ma poi lui ha fatto il pappamolle.

translation.en: Sounds like Karen.
She's mad because I took our life savings and bought a fleet of ambulances.

translation.en: I barely know how to drive this one.
But you can't force people to change.

translation.en: You gotta do what works for you, and he can either join the party, or it's his loss. You know?

translation.en: That's so true.
Hey, guys.
Honey, can I talk to you for a second?
Yeah.
Look, I… I feel real bad. I don't want to be the spoiler here.

translation.en: Well, don't feel bad. You are not the spoiler. You do you.

translation.en: Okay?
Hey guys, let me see what you got. Big ask number four. Let me see.

translation.en: Okay, number four. Putts N' Stuff.
That'd be very cool. We'd have a great time. But it does not compare
translation.it: Certo, ci divertiremmo un sacco, ma non è paragonabile…

translation.en: to Magic Mountain!
-What? -Whoo!
But wait. What about the distance rule?
I've decided to make an exception.
And your dad has something he wants to say.

Well, guys, I'm feeling, um…
I'm… I'm feeling a little…
I'm feeling a little bit sick.
You're sick?
Are you going home?
I think I might be coming down with Magic Mountain fever! Whoo!

translation.en: -But how are we gonna get there? -Yeah.
Because the SUV is at the Kablowey field, and even with traffic, it'll take forever.

translation.en: Uh, duh. It's Yes Day!

translation.en: Are we ready for some roller coaster madness?

translation.en: -Yes! -Yeah!
Just so we're clear, if an emergency comes in, I gotta leave you on the side of the road.

translation.en: -What if we're the emergency? -Oh God.

translation.en: [chuckles] Good one.

translation.en: [Jean] Oh boy. Hold on.
All right, you guys can make fun of me if you want, but I brought clean clothes.

translation.en: -Oh my gosh! -Just in case!
-Thank you so much, Mom. -That is a nice mom.

translation.en: Beats smelling like Kool-Aid, so…

translation.en: It's Magic Mountain, baby!
-Whoa! -[screaming]
[Carlos] Eyes on the road, please. [Jean] Got it. My bad.

translation.it: Attenzione, visitatori del parco: la famiglia Torres è qui per un giorno dei sì, e voglio che diciate tutti di sì. Proprio così.

translation.en: and I want you to say yes and you to say yes. That is right.
translation.it: per un giorno dei sì, e voglio che diciate tutti di sì. Proprio così.

translation.en: It's all about those yeses, so get ready for some fun!

translation.en: You gotta say yes.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
Why did I say yes to this, Katie? [screams]

translation.en: Okay.
-Great. There you go, honey. -Thank you.
It's really nice to get out of the house, with everyone.

translation.en: And we have to do it more 'cause you are growing up.

translation.en: We have to take advantage.
I'm gonna get cotton candy. You want some?

translation.en: No. Thanks, honey.
-Oh, hey, Katie. Your… Your… -[chimes]
Great.
I need you to text Layla right away that her cousin isn't taking you to Fleekfest. Your mother is.

translation.en: What?
-Stay here with your sister. Okay? -Okay.
translation.it: - Resta qui con tua sorella, ok? - Ok.

translation.en: She's trying to hook you up with some older guys.

translation.en: -Why were you checking my phone? -You left it there.
translation.it: - Perché guardavi il mio telefono? - L'hai lasciato lì.

translation.en: You're overreacting because I can't control what Layla sends.
translation.it: Stai esagerando. Non posso controllare cosa m'invia Layla.

translation.en: She was responding to a text you sent. "Guys at my school are so boring."
translation.it: Ha risposto a un tuo messaggio. "I ragazzi della mia scuola sono noiosi."

translation.en: You were snooping. Once I saw the picture, yeah, I opened your phone.
translation.it: - Hai sbirciato davvero? - Quando ho visto la foto, sì.

translation.en: Dad, can you please back me up here?
I know you want your independence. I get that I'm the bummer,

translation.en: but let me be clear, Katie.
If I don't take you to the concert tonight, you aren't going.
translation.it: se non ti accompagno io, non andrai al concerto.

translation.en: -I'm done with Yes Day. I'm done. -Oh, well, you're grounded.
translation.it: - Ho chiuso col giorno dei sì. - Beh, sei in punizione.

translation.en: I can't believe I let you fool me into thinking you actually changed.

translation.en: You really don't trust me.
It isn't about trust. It's about being your parent.

translation.en: Please, give me a break.
What's happening is I don't need you anymore, and you can't handle it.

translation.en: [Carlos, in Spanish] Katerina.
Enough.
Take your siblings to the carousel.
[in English] Go now.
[Katie] Guys, come on.
-[Nando] Where are we going? -[Katie] Carousel.
[Nando] This is the best day ever!
-Yay! -Yay! -Yay! -Yay! -[Ellie] Yay! -Yay!
Don't you guys get it?
Mom and Dad are just using this day to take control of us.
translation.it: Mamma e papà usano questo giorno per controllarci.

translation.en: They think by giving us a Yes Day, we'll do what they want for the rest of our lives.
translation.it: Pensano che così faremo ciò che vogliono per tutta la vita.

translation.en: Nuh-uh.
Yeah, nuh-uh.
It's all a big con.
If today's just a big con, I hope I get conned for the rest of my life.
translation.it: Se è davvero così, spero di essere truffato per sempre.

translation.en: Yeah. Me too.
Cardinal rule. I shouldn't have looked at her phone. No wonder she was mad.
translation.it: Non dovevo curiosare nel suo telefono. Per forza è arrabbiata.

translation.en: But it was right there, and there was a picture of a boy.
translation.it: Ma era lì e c'era una foto di un ragazzo.

translation.en: Ugh, I hate when she hates me.
translation.it: Odio il fatto che mi odi.

translation.en: She doesn't hate you. She's just individuating.
translation.it: Non ti odia. Sta solo crescendo.

translation.en: Individuating? It's annoying.
translation.it: Ah, è così che cresce? È fastidioso.

translation.en: I just hope she understands that it all comes from a place of love.
translation.it: Spero che capisca che lo faccio per amore.

translation.en: -I know. -Don't you?
She's just our little girl.
She's not that little.
Look at that gorilla. It looks like the one Katie used to walk around with.
translation.it: Guarda quel gorilla. Sembra proprio quello che aveva Katie.

translation.en: She called him "Mr. Golilla."
[Carlos] Oh yeah, I remember it got really filthy.
translation.it: Oh, sì, ricordo che divenne molto sporco.

translation.en: Well, yeah, it had its own car seat. We took it everywhere,
translation.it: Beh, sì, aveva un seggiolino per sé. Lo portavamo ovunque.

translation.en: and she was so cute with her pigtails and her overalls and a heart on the pocket.
translation.it: E lei era così carina con le treccine, la tuta e un cuore sulla tasca.

translation.en: Yeah.
Back when she loved me and was my little buddy. I know.
translation.it: - Allora mi adorava ed era la mia bambina. - Già.

translation.en: -What do you say? You wanna play? -No, it's fine. Thank you.
translation.it: Vi va di giocare? No, grazie.

translation.en: Carlos, I wanna play. I'm gonna win Katie that gorilla.
translation.it: Voglio giocare e vincere quel gorilla per Katie.

translation.en: -Then she won't be mean to me. -You sure?
-Hi. -Hi.
I would like to win that, please. You'll have to beat this nice lady.
translation.it: - Vorrei vincere quello. - Dovrà battere questa gentile signora.

translation.en: Oh, okay. Hi. How are you?
I need to win this pink gorilla for my daughter, Katie. We're in a fight.
translation.it: Devo vincere il gorilla rosa per mia figlia. Abbiamo litigato.

translation.en: [scoffs] What if… What if I want to win that gorilla?
I already have the blue and brown gorillas. Now I need a pink one.
translation.it: Ho già quelli blu e marrone. Mi serve quello rosa.

translation.en: Oh. Well, just go easy on me, okay? Just, girl code.
translation.it: Ci vada piano, allora. Per solidarietà femminile.

translation.en: -Katie's not five years old anymore, okay? -I know she's not.
translation.it: - Katie non ha più cinque anni. - Sì, lo so.

translation.en: When she sees the gorilla, she'll know I'm her mama and remember everything I've done for her.
translation.it: Ma quando vedrà il gorilla, ricorderà tutto ciò che la mamma ha fatto per lei.

translation.en: All right, ready?
-I think that we should go. -Don't distract me. I'm on a mission.
translation.it: - Amore, dovremmo andare. - Non distrarmi. Sono in missione.

translation.en: Ready?
-[bell rings] -[woman] Toss!
You're going down, lady.
Ooh, it's so close!
This is for driving her retainer three hours to camp.
translation.it: Questo è per averle portato l'apparecchio guidando 3 ore.

translation.en: This is for peeing every time I sneeze.
translation.it: Questo perché faccio pipì quando starnutisco.

translation.en: -Will you be quiet? -Okay, let's be good sports.
translation.it: Vuole stare zitta? Dai, siate sportive.

translation.en: This is for making me sleep-train you three times.
translation.it: Per averle insegnato a dormire la notte tre volte.

translation.en: Shut up!
-It's for my daughter, Katie! -[woman 2] Quiet!
translation.it: - È per mia figlia Katie! - Silenzio!

translation.en: I did it. Don't mess with Mama.
translation.it: Ce l'ho fatta. Non si scherza con mamma.

translation.en: No. No, no.
I won.
What? I just won. I've never won anything. I just won.
translation.it: Cosa? No, io! Non ho mai vinto nulla, ma ora sì!

translation.en: No, I won by, like, a nose.
translation.it: Per poco, ma ho vinto io.

translation.en: Come on. We all saw it. She won. It was me. I won.
translation.it: - Abbiamo visto tutti che ha vinto lei. - No, io.

translation.en: -[Allison] Miss Cheetah? -What?
Can you tell her that I clearly won? I was like a sniper.
translation.it: Può dirle che ho vinto io? Ero come un cecchino.

translation.en: I am a freaking sniper, okay?
translation.it: Io sono un maledetto cecchino, ok?

translation.en: -No, you are not. I won that gorilla! -Honey!
translation.it: - No. Ho vinto io quel gorilla! - Tesoro!

translation.en: -I'm staying out of this. -[Carlos] It's not worth it!
translation.it: - Io me ne tiro fuori. - Non ne vale la pena!

translation.en: This is my gorilla! [woman 2] You cheating suburban soccer mom!

translation.en: I'm looking for my phone. Sorry, guys. -Sorry, I'm looking for my phone. -[woman] Watch it!
translation.it: - Sto solo cercando il telefono. Scusate. - Attenta!

translation.en: [man] Yo, what are you doing?
You've got this. [chuckles]
She does not have this. She is not breathing, and she's paralyzed.
translation.it: Non è vero. Non sta respirando, è paralizzata.

translation.en: -I wanna go home. -[man 1] Seriously?
translation.it: - Voglio andare a casa. - Sul serio?

translation.en: -[man 2] Try and calm down, please? -[man 3] Grow up!
translation.it: - Ti vuoi calmare? - Cresci un po'!

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause, Katie, I love you ♪
Mom!
-Mom! -♪ All your loving ♪
Mom!
Thank you. Katie?
Oh, honey.
I am so sorry. [sobbing]
You were right about this place. [sobbing]
You are the best mom.
I'm sorry. [Allison] Oh, I love you.
Honey. [cries]
We gotta follow that? I'm scared.
translation.it: - E ora dovremmo esibirci noi? - Ho paura.

translation.en: Guys, relax. Just go with it.
I'm really sorry about what I said.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per quanto ho detto.

translation.en: Ugh, don't worry.
Worse has been said to moms.
translation.it: È stato detto di peggio, alle mamme.

translation.en: It's hard to let you grow up. [cries]
That's the truth.
It's just hard for moms.
translation.it: È molto difficile per le mamme.

translation.en: It would've been way more fun to come with you anyway.
translation.it: Sarebbe stato più divertente venire con te.

translation.en: -Really? [laughs] -Yeah.
Well, I… I came anyway.
Oh, my tears. They're gonna make my glitter fall off.
translation.it: Oh, le lacrime no, mi faranno cadere i glitter.

translation.en: Ugh, I spent about two hours putting this bedazzle on.
translation.it: Ci ho messo due ore ad applicarli.

translation.en: Are you guys gonna help me finish this song or what?
I think she's talking to you, Mom.
-[Allison] No. -H.E.R. is calling you on stage. -[chuckles] No. -You have to go.
translation.it: - No. No. - H.E.R. ti chiama sul palco. Devi andare.

translation.en: I was talking to both of you.
Get up here.
All of us?
Just them, okay.
Wanna do it?
Yeah, let's do it.
♪ Baby, baby ♪
Go, Tasha!
I'm by myself. Okay, cool.
Wolfie, I love you, man!
Yeah, back at you!
Be careful with those beakers. They're going back to school.
translation.it: Attente coi becher, devono tornare a scuola.

translation.en: Guys, I told you to take all that stuff out. Take it out, now. All of it.
translation.it: Vi avevo detto di portare tutto fuori. Tutto quanto, subito.

translation.en: And just keep, you know, scrubbing.
No slacking off, okay? I see you.
translation.it: Non battere le fiacca, ok? Ti controllo.

translation.en: Whoa, Dad.
You became, like, a scary dad back there.
translation.it: Ti sei trasformato in un papà spaventoso.

translation.en: Yeah?
Well, I mean, that's… Sometimes you gotta put your foot down,
translation.it: Beh, insomma, a volte devi essere duro…

translation.en: even with the ones you love, like you.
translation.it: anche con le persone che ami. Come te.

translation.en: No, it was pretty cool. I didn't know you actually had it in you.
translation.it: No, è stato forte. Non sapevo che potessi essere così.

translation.en: [Carlos] Come here.
-You're still grounded. You know that? -Oh, yeah, super grounded.
translation.it: Ma sei in punizione, lo sai? Sì, decisamente.

translation.en: You got the point. Hey, no slacking off.
translation.it: Ottimo. Ehi, non battere la fiacca!

translation.en: The whole thing. The whole thing. The whole column. Go.
translation.it: Devi pulire tutta la colonna, forza.

translation.en: Hey.
[Allison] Hi, honey.
[chuckles] Hey! Oh, baby. I'm so glad you're okay.
translation.it: Ehi! Sono felice che tu stia bene, piccola.

translation.en: I wanna be a scientist, too, and blow things up.
translation.it: Anch'io voglio fare la scienziata e far esplodere le cose.

translation.en: -[Allison] You want to blow things up? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Vuoi far esplodere le cose? - Sì.

translation.en: It looks like you got a lot of practice tonight.
translation.it: Sembra che tu abbia fatto molta pratica.

translation.en: Nando, how could you let this happen? You said you'd text if anything went wrong.
translation.it: Come hai potuto permetterlo? Dovevi scrivermi in caso di problemi.

translation.en: How could you let this happen? You're the oldest, Katie.
translation.it: Come hai potuto tu. Sei la più grande, Katie.

translation.en: Everything they did while you were at that concert is your responsibility too.
translation.it: Ciò che hanno fatto mentre eri via è anche una tua responsabilità.

translation.en: I should ground you for twice as long as Nando.
If it makes you feel better, I was worried sick the whole time.
translation.it: Se ti può consolare, ero molto preoccupata.

translation.en: Like mother, like daughter, huh?
Now help your brother clean.
It's not so bad being the bad guy. Wow.
translation.it: - Non è così male essere il cattivo. - Wow.

translation.en: Is it crazy I'm already looking forward to our next Yes Day?
translation.it: È assurdo che voglia già un altro giorno dei sì?

translation.en: No, no, no, the day is not over yet. I still have one more thing I wanna do.
translation.it: No, la giornata non è ancora finita. C'è un'ultima cosa che voglio fare.

translation.en: Hashtag, "Winning."
I cannot believe you stole this gorilla.
She didn't steal it. She won it square and fair.
translation.it: Non l'ha rubato. L'ha vinto legalmente.

translation.en: Square and fair. I did.
-My turn. -[Katie] Thank you, Mom.
-[Carlos] Why can't I get my feet? -[Allison] Carlos, come on.
translation.it: - Perché non arrivo ai miei piedi? - E dai!

translation.en: -Right on my face. -[laughing]
Nando, why do I feel like you're gonna break my nose?
translation.it: Nando, ho la sensazione che mi romperai il naso.

translation.en: That's the only thing I haven't broken today.
translation.it: È l'unica cosa che io non mi sono rotto, oggi.

translation.en: -[kisses] -I love you, Mama. I love you, baby.
translation.it: - Ti voglio bene, mamma. - E io a te, piccola.

translation.en: [Carlos] Nando, are you sure you got rid of all the catalyst? [Nando] Yep. I flushed it down the toilet.
translation.it: - Hai buttato tutto il catalizzatore? - Sì. L'ho scaricato nel water.

translation.en: -[Carlos] What? -[Ellie] What's that sound?
translation.it: Cosa? - Cos'è questo suono? - Spero sia pioggia.

translation.en: [Allison] I hope that's rain.
translation.it: - Cos'è questo suono? - Spero sia pioggia.

translation.en: [Ellie] Mama, look! More foam!
-[Nando] Whoops. -[Katie gasps] Oh no!
[Allison and Carlos] Nando!
♪ 'Cause today's gonna be my day ♪ ♪ I just wanna climb ♪
translation.it: BASATO SUL ROMANZO DI AMY KROUSE ROSENTHAL E TOM LICHTENHELD

translation.en: -Ah. Ah. -[Nando] Three!
-Ow! Ow! -[Nando] Two!
[Nando] One! Nando, why?
I didn't sign up for this!
They'll never catch me.
I'm like a gazelle!
Yes Day forever!
